name: Robot Frenzy
description:
In a parallel universe, robots are taking over the world. It is up to you to defend it and stop the robots.

Destroy robots in this fun, action-packed top down shooter. Try to get the highest score.

Made for the GoedWare Game Jam #7

CONTROLS:

  • Move - WASD / ARROW KEYS
  • Shoot - LMB
  • Special attack - SPACE
